courses.title: Introduction to Python Programming
courses.description: Learn the basics of Python programming language.
courses.author: user1

modules.title: Getting Started with Python
modules.content: Introduction to the Python programming language, its history, and features.

modules.title: Setting Up Python Environment
modules.content: Guide on setting up a Python development environment.

modules.title: Basic Data Types
modules.content: Explanation of basic data types in Python (int, float, string, etc.).

modules.title: Control Structures
modules.content: Understanding control structures such as if-else statements and loops.

modules.title: Functions in Python
modules.content: Introduction to functions and function declaration in Python.

modules.title: Using Modules
modules.content: How to use built-in and external modules in Python for additional functionality.

courses.title: Web Development Fundamentals with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
courses.description: Learn the basics of web development including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
courses.author: user2

modules.title: HTML Basics
modules.content: Introduction to HTML, its structure, and basic tags.

modules.title: Working with Forms
modules.content: Creating forms and handling user input in HTML.

modules.title: CSS Syntax and Selectors
modules.content: Explanation of CSS syntax and various selector types.

modules.title: Layout and Positioning
modules.content: Understanding CSS layout techniques and positioning.

modules.title: Introduction to JavaScript
modules.content: Introduction to JavaScript language, its features, and use cases.

modules.title: Working with DOM
modules.content: Manipulating the Document Object Model (DOM) using JavaScript.

courses.title: Java Programming for Beginners
courses.description: Learn Java programming language from scratch.
courses.author: user3

modules.title: Getting Started with Java
modules.content: Introduction to Java, its history, and features.

modules.title: Variables and Data Types
modules.content: Understanding variables, data types, and variable declaration in Java.

modules.title: Decision Making with If-Else
modules.content: Using if-else statements for decision making in Java.

modules.title: Looping with For and While
modules.content: Looping constructs in Java using for and while loops.

modules.title: Classes and Objects
modules.content: Introduction to classes, objects, and class inheritance in Java.

modules.title: Exception Handling
modules.content: Handling exceptions and error conditions in Java programs.

courses.title: Introduction to Data Science with Python
courses.description: Learn the basics of data science using Python programming language.
courses.author: user4

modules.title: What is Data Science?
modules.content: Introduction to the field of data science and its applications.

modules.title: Data Analysis Process
modules.content: Understanding the data analysis process and its components.

modules.title: Introduction to Pandas
modules.content: Introduction to the Pandas library for data manipulation in Python.

modules.title: Data Cleaning and Transformation
modules.content: Techniques for cleaning and transforming data using Pandas.

modules.title: Introduction to Matplotlib
modules.content: Introduction to the Matplotlib library for data visualization.

modules.title: Creating Plots and Charts
modules.content: Creating various types of plots and charts using Matplotlib.

courses.title: Introduction to Machine Learning
courses.description: Learn the basics of machine learning algorithms and techniques.
courses.author: user5

modules.title: What is Machine Learning?
modules.content: Introduction to machine learning, its types, and applications.

modules.title: Supervised vs. Unsupervised Learning
modules.content: Understanding the difference between supervised and unsupervised learning.

modules.title: Simple Linear Regression
modules.content: Introduction to simple linear regression and its implementation.

modules.title: Multiple Linear Regression
modules.content: Understanding multiple linear regression and its applications.

modules.title: Decision Trees
modules.content: Introduction to decision trees and their use in classification.

modules.title: K-Nearest Neighbors
modules.content: Understanding the K-Nearest Neighbors algorithm for classification.
